article.title: Billion_%28disambiguation%29
article.paragraph: WiktionarybillionBillionis a name for a large number. It may refer specifically to:

list.listitem: 1,000,000,000(10^9, one thousand million), the short scale definition now normal in both British and American English
1,000,000,000,000(10^12, one million million), the long scale definition used formerly in Britain and currently in certain other languages
Billions (TV series), an upcoming Showtime series
Jack Billion(born 1939), the 2006 Democratic Party candidate for governor of South Dakota
